channel.title: SinKom IT Service Provider
channel.description: Jasa IT Professional yang menangani berbagai macam project.

item.title: We offer modern solutions for growing your business
item.author: Administrator
item.description: Jasa IT Professional yang menangani berbagai macam project.
item.content:encoded:
We provide simpler, faster and more affordable IT solutions

Discuss your needs with our expert team to get the right solution.

Sarana Informasi Komunikasi SinKom

Whatever the industry, small or large scale, SinKom is here as your business solution.

We are here to help you meet your needs regarding technology and information and provide various types of IT services such as Application Systems, Web Development, Domain Hosting / VPS, Digital Marketing, Software Development, Mobile Application Development, CCTV Installation, Network Installation and Network Configuration.

Software Development

Development of web-based applications that make your business processes easier to access by all parties via any browser.

Mobile Application Development

Mobile Application Creation on Android and iOS platforms.

Website Master.

maintaining one or more websites, web developer, site author, website administrator, Digital Marketing : SEO & SEM Marketing.
